title: What to do if someone has Gas or Urinary Incontinence & keeps repeating Wudu & Prayer? Assimalhakeem
transcript: if a person had a sudden attack of urine incontinence or passing wind continuously and every time he performs rudl starts to pray it comes out so he goes in perform model again and repeats the prayer etc he tries his level best but then the time is about to expire if this is the case as you have described Mary Ann in this case yes you can perform model and pray even if you pass wind because this is beyond your ability and you have to pray on time
